ActivityOther.Description: Dolly Parton Imagination Library - A program where United way pays for the postage on free books that are sent out to children ages 0-5 each month.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE INTENTION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS TO ACCUMULATE EARNINGS ON ENDOWMENT FUNDS FOR FUTURE EXPENSES TO BE DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT A LATER DATE. Note, earnings on endowment funds are recorded in temporarily restricted net assets.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: The Organization's policy is to evaluate the likelihood that its uncertain tax positions will prevail upon examination based on the extent to which those positions have substantial support within the Internal Revenue code and Regulations, Revenue Rulings, court decisions, and other evidence. It is the opinion of management that the Organization has no significant uncertain tax positions that would be subject to change upon examination. The federal income tax returns of the Organization are subject to examination by the IRS, generally for three years after they were filed.
increase in temporarily restricted net assets $6,869
combined federal campaign revenue not included on f/s 54,466

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: all organizations must complete an application for the use of the grant funds prior to the awarding of the grant. Subsequent to receipt of the funds, all organizations must file quarterly reports and a final report detailing the use of those funds in compliance with the original application.
